title: Module Developer, Institute MIS in IIT(ISM) Dhanbad
description: Development of the Training and Placement module in the institute MIS which automates the activities of Career Development Center (CDC) online.Developing the desired features in PHP using CodeIgniter for MVC architecture. Database creation and management of the module using the tools for MariaDB.
languages: PHP, SQL, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap

title: Hackfest, IIT ISM Dhanbad 7th Edition
description: Created a web application, which has 3 modules driven by Deep Learning, which predicts the price of the crop for the next 6 months, identifies diseases in the crop, and detects weed in the Crop, with an accuracy over 95%. Uses CNN. 3rd Position in Nationwide Hackathon.

title: Hackfest, IIT ISM Dhanbad 6th Edition
description: Created an automatic attendance recorder application, which detects human faces present at assigned places of students using image data. Uses CNN. 10th Position in Nationwide Hackathon.
